Introduction
This topic contains information on the requirements for retroactive payment of Veterans Pension under 38 CFR 3.400, including
what constitutes a qualifying disability for a retroactive pension award under 38 CFR 3.400
, and
rating decisions to dispose of the issue of a retroactive effective date under 38 CFR 3.400
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Determining Disability, Unemployability, and Marginal Employment for Pension
citation: Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
